raw_comment: I notice that this graph compares the student chances to get accepted into a college based on requirements like money and legacy. The legacy students had more chance to get admitted to one of those colleges than a student who weren't  part of a legacy.
ace_sentences: This graph compares the chances of students to get accepted into a college.
The comparison is based on requirements such as money and legacy status.
Legacy students have a higher chance to get admitted to one of these colleges than non-legacy students.
